entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 11:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
